overall.description: Interpret a buffer as a 1-dimensional array.

buffer.description: An object that exposes the buffer interface.

dtype.description: Data-type of the returned array; default: float.

count.description: Number of items to read. -1 means all data in the buffer.

offset.description: Start reading the buffer from this offset (in bytes); default: 0.

note: If the buffer has data that is not in machine byte-order, this should be specified as part of the data-type, e.g.: '
